thread.title: OnePlus Founder Apologizes for OnePlus 2 Delays
thread.title_full: OnePlus Founder Apologizes for OnePlus 2 Delays

title: OnePlus Founder Apologizes for OnePlus 2 Delays
text: OnePlus Founder Apologizes for OnePlus 2 Delays Friday, 11 September 2015 (14 minutes ago) It's been almost a month since Chinese company OnePlus revealed its “flagship killer” smartphone, but the OnePlus 2 is a very hard to come by device. Just like the previous high-end smarpthone launched by OnePlus, the new model only sells through invitations, which seems to be sparsely handed to customers. If you've been among some of the luckiest persons in the world, then you have already received a OnePlus 2 invitation and already ordered the smartphone. Unfortunat...
